name: Apricus Brew
description:
Apricus Brew is your local magic café. Our hours differ depending on the season - whether you need a late night espresso to get through exam season, a quick peruse of the communal library, or a peachy green tea with friends, swing past Apricus for a comfy café experience.

This is a worldbuilding environment and a very short play. Controls are WASD, shift and mouse. I may upload an in-browser version at some point. Enjoy :))

Music Credit:

deep space

myself & i

i don't wanna feel
